subject: Frais de douane
description_text:
Bonjour à combien s’élève les taxes pour la France.
Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hello, for orders under €150, we process customs clearance via the IOSS one-stop system. The system will automatically charge applicable taxes and duties, which in France should be 20%.
